sentence: It's not as exciting as MADISON CAWTHORN made it sound, but it's still very sexy.? The great chef JOS ANDRS is here tonight.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Party city

sentence: DAILY MADISON: New reporting from WRAL's Bryan Anderson shows that Rep. MADISON CAWTHORN (R-N.C.) gave his second cousin, STEPHEN SMITH, over $141,000 from his campaign and House office.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Loose lips about sinking ships
